title: KitchenCraft Professional Spaghetti Spoon / Pasta Server with Non Stick Safe Nylon Head, Stainless Steel, 35 cm, Silver/Black
features: NON STICK SAFE: Use this pasta server to scoop, scrape and serve with confidence - its nylon head won't leave a single scratch
MESS FREE SERVING: Its sturdy prongs separate pasta as you stir, and securely grip it while you serve up
PERFORATED BOWL: Features a built in pasta strainer, so you can serve spaghetti or short pasta, and never end up with a soggy plate
ROBUST QUALITY: A stainless steel handle provides a comfy grip and smart finish, and means its dishwasher safe too
USEFUL INFO: Part of KitchenCraft's Professional range, this spaghetti spoon comes with a 25 year guarantee
description: From the manufacturer KitchenCraft Professional Nylon Pasta Server / Spoon with Stainless Steel Handle Everyday kitchen tools, extraordinary quality Scoop portions of pasta without scratching your non-stick pans. KitchenCraft Professional's spaghetti spoon features a nylon head that won't leave so much as scratch! This heat-resistant pasta serving spoon is ideal for serving all types of pasta. Its sturdy prongs separate clumps of long spaghetti in the pan, and securely grip it as you serve. Serving short pasta? Its deep bowl makes it easy to scoop up servings of fusilli and penne, while its draining holes puts a stop to plates of soggy pasta. Like all KitchenCraft Professional products, this pasta spoon is designed to provide impressive performance every day. With its nylon head and sleek stainless steel handle, you can rely on it for years to come! Length: 35 cm (14 inches) Dishwasher safe Features an integrated hanging loop Key Features Non-stick safe KitchenCraft Professional uses only high-quality nylon that’s gentle on pans. This means when you scoop up servings of spaghetti or rigatoni, you won’t run the risk of damaging their non-stick coatings. Mess-free serving This pasta spoon is perfect for serving long pasta. Its durable prongs prevent these long strands from sliding off back into the pan or on your worktops. No soggy spaghetti! No-one wants a plate of waterlogged pasta. That’s why this spaghetti spoon features perforations, which allow excess water to simply drain off back into your saucepan. Heat, stain and odour resistant The spaghetti server is heat resistant to 210 degrees Celsius (410 degrees Fahrenheit). It’s also stain and odour-resistant, so it’s really easy to clean and won’t transfer flavours between recipes. Large bowl You’re not just limited to serving spaghetti with this spoon. Its large bowl is ideal for scooping up ample portions of short pasta, such as penne or fusilli. Long, strong handle With its balanced design and sturdy stainless steel handle, this pasta server makes plating pasta up really easy. It’s comfortable to hold, won’t bend or flex, and reaches right to the bottom of deep pans. Nylon Kitchen Tools from KitchenCraft Professional KitchenCraft’s Professional range has been created to provide two things – exceptional quality, and exceptional value for money. Its nylon tools combine tried-and-tested designs with quality materials to provide you with long-lasting performance. Explore the full range today by typing ‘KitchenCraft Professional’ into your Amazon search bar.
